choices: Mariah Cortez - 17 year old high school student
Clark Simon - 40 year old stay at home dad.
Abigail Smith 35 year old house wife
Daniel Johnson - 20 year old college football player
Stella Charles - 45 year old high school principal
1.content: This chapter is to determine who will be transformed into a bug.
1.title: Once Bitten.

11.content:
Mariah was running late to school because her sister Victoria used up all the hot water for her thirty minute shower. Jogging down the empty hallway she knew her homeroom teacher Mrs. Sanchez was going to write her up. She never needed an excuse regardless. nearing her class room Mariah felt a tickle at the back of her neck.

Instinctively she reaches back and swatted what she presumed to be a bug. Unfortunately she was right. As her hand landed the unknown bug bit down on her skin. "Ouch!" She hissed.

The bug bite burned horribly, worse than anything Mariah felt before. Breaking out into an immediate swear Mariah felt like passing out. Her legs wobbled as she was forced to hold onto the lockers for support.

She managed to move down the hall and into the girl's restroom. Sliding into a stall Mariah slumped down over the toilet with the urge to puke, but not the ability. Despite the unsanitary nature Mariah rested her head on the cool toilet seat.

Her body began to tingle as if a million ants were walking across her skin. She tried to push back to a kneeling position, but failed. Unable to keep her eyes open Mariah passed out on the restroom floor.

Almost as soon as she passed out Mariah popped back awake. She felt so strange, and realized the entire world looked strange. To her horror she had some how turned into.....
11.title: Mariah Cortez - 17 year old high school student

choices: A group of cheerleaders came in.
112.content:
"No, no, no, no...." Mariah begged repeatedly.

"This can't be real. No fucking way. I am not a roach!" She screamed.

Despite her protests Mariah now had the form a small german cockroach. Her body was long, flat, with three legs protruding from each side of her abdomen. Mandibles replaced her once pouty lips. Long Antennae rose from the top of her head.

Looking frantically around the restroom floor Mariah realized her clothes were missing. She wondered if they somehow transformed with her. She didn't begin to understand how that was even possible. Thought five minutes prior she would have thought turning into a roach was impossible.

"Oh my god. How am I going to get help ?" She asked herself outloud.

She didn't want to stay a bug forever. She hoped that somewhere, someone knew this happened to her. That there was some way of turning back Into a human.

"Okay, okay, calm down Mariah. You can figure this out." She said trying to give herself a pep talk.

Deciding that her first action had to be leaving the restroom Mariah start moving towards the door. As she approached the towering door she felt tremors running through the ground. A moment later the door swung open as......
112.title: A roach

info.brief_description: After being bitten by a mysterious bug, you are transformed into a bug.
info.description:
This story will follow different characters as they go through their story of being transformed into a bug. This is primarily an unaware story, but good aware chapters are welcome.

As always no sexual content with children, unbirthing, or diapers, but feet, vore, and crushing allowed.

Feel free to include characters from other storylines as giants/giantess instead of bugs.

GP for good additions.
